content: in this legal case the viru county court made a decision on 05042019 the court ruled in favor of one party referred to as sion and ordered the other party to fulfill certain obligations the court also imposed a penalty on the other party for noncompliance with the previous court decision the court clarified the specific actions that the other party must take to comply with the decision and set a deadline for them to fulfill their obligations the court warned that failure to comply may result in further legal consequences the court also stated that the procedural costs will be borne by the parties involved but the exact amount is not specified overall this summary explains the progress of the case and the courts decision without revealing the names of the parties involved
